transform_def.name: designed15
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) f = if r < halfinvpi() then cos(p_in.y) * sin(p_in.x) else recip(fmod(length(p_in), atan(p_in.x * p_in.y) / cos(p_in.x))) z = cos(length(p_in)) * cos(p_in.x) / atan(tanh(p_in.y * abs(p_in.x)) + sin(p_in.y)) / pi() * tan(length(p_in)) / sin(p_in.x * sin(p_in.y * atan(p_in.x / f))) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
